thread.section_title: Think Protection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Think Protection | thinkprotection.com
thread.title: JMD

author: JMD
title: JMD
text: I am incredibly happy with my Think Protection system. At first I thought it would just be a way to get an alarm and save some money (compared to all the other companies I looked at). But wow!!!! This system is top notch. Not only do I feel incredibly safe inside my home once I activate the system, but I love the countless other features that I have or have access to upgrade to over time. Cameras inside and out, thermostat, garage door opener, lights... it can do everything. All the functionality of a more expensive systems at literally a fraction of the cost. Simply couldn't be happier.
